text: ini, avar (dampatimār) tam'mil bhinnicc pēākumenn niṅṅaḷ bhayappeṭunna pakṣaṁ avanṟe āḷkkāril ninn oru mad'dhyasthaneyuṁ avaḷuṭe āḷkkāril ninn oru mad'dhyasthaneyuṁ niṅṅaḷ niyēāgikkuka. iru vibhāgavuṁ anurañjanamāṇ uddēśikkunnateṅkil allāhu avarkkiṭayil yēājippuṇṭākkunnatāṇ‌. tīrccayāyuṁ allāhu sarvvajñanuṁ sūkṣmajñanumākunnu
